Glendale INFINITI Serving Beverly Hills

If you’re looking for a stylish new sedan or a luxurious SUV, you’ll find the best choices of high-quality models with Glendale INFINITI. With such a large selection, Beverly Hills drivers will surely find the perfect vehicle for their lifestyle. Discover the rightnew INFINITI model for you, whether you’re looking at a stylish sedan like the Q50 or a luxurious SUV with the QX55. Our sales team will make the car-buying experience fun and stress-free.

Ownership Benefits

When you buy an INFINITI, you’re more than just a customer. You become part of the Glendale INFINITI family. We want you to enjoy owning and driving an INFINITI for years to come. Owning an INFINITI is about more than just driving a nice vehicle. With the Total Ownership Experience, you can drive with confidence no matter where your destination leads. Here are some of the many benefits you get to enjoy for owning an INFINITI:

24-hour roadside assistance

Courtesy vehicle when your vehicle is being repaired

Repeat customer incentives

Routine service and repairs from certified technicians

INFINITI Financial Services

Trip interruption benefits

Get answers to your questions with the INFINITI Personal Assistant. An assistant can help make your life simpler by assisting you with making hotel reservations or checking traffic. Stop into Glendale INFINITI to see our inventory and discover more about all these benefits. Our sales team will show you how to utilize the technology that is part of every INFINITI, including the INFINITI Personal Assistant.

INFINITI Warranty

Enjoy greater peace of mind as you travel in your INFINITI, knowing it is backed by an exceptional warranty. Just look at all you get with this outstanding coverage.

Powertrain Limited Warranty – 6 years/70,000 miles

Basic coverage – 4 years/60,000 miles

Roadside Assistance – 4 years/unlimited miles

Emission Control – 5 years/50,000 miles

Corrosion coverage – 7 years/unlimited miles

Experience even more protection for your INFINITI with long-lasting coverage when you buy the INIFNITI Elite Extended Protection Plan. This plan covers your INFINITI components for as long as eight years or 120,000 along with extended roadside assistance. You can rely on this assistance for more than just a vehicle breakdown. Use it when you have a flat tire or need to jump your battery. You can even call on help for fuel delivery or when you get locked out of your vehicle.

Enjoy the convenience of buying or leasing a new or pre-owned INFINITI online. A free at-home test drive lets you try it out while home delivery after purchase offers convenience in your busy schedule.

Leasing

If you like the advantages of leasing a vehicle, you will appreciate what the INFINITI leading program has to offer. You can lease your INFINITI of choice for $0 down which only increases your monthly payments by $27. When the lease ends, you can return your INFINITI with just a phone call to 866-621-9123 for an inspection of the model. Make any necessary repairs after the inspection and set up an appointment to return the vehicle at the end of the lease.

The next step to end the lease is to complete a statement which provides information for the lease termination and federal odometer reading. You will pay any fees and charges. With the online account manager, you will get personal help along the way. If you choose to lease another INFINITI or buy a vehicle when your lease ends, you may quality for up to $895 in loyalty offers.

Lease vs. Purchase

When you’re looking at a vehicle, you have two choices on how to make it your new set of wheels. You can either buy it or lease it. Both are viable options, but they are quite different ways of allowing you to have a vehicle to drive.

Leasing is basically renting the vehicle. You make a monthly payment that gives you the privilege to drive it for a certain period of time. You usually pay less money down than if you were buying, or you may be able to lease with no money down. You sign a contract to lease for a set time, often between two and four years. Once the lease is up, you can either buy the vehicle, trade it in for another lease, or just return it. One of the big benefits is that your leased payments are usually cheaper than if you were financing it. You also don’t have to get a buyer when you want to upgrade. However, you may have limited mileage and you will need to maintain the vehicle in good condition or pay for the damage at the end of the lease.

Buying an INFINITI means the vehicle is yours at the end of the loan. Your payments will probably be higher since you are paying for the entire price of the vehicle, not just the time you will be driving it. You can customize your vehicle with special accessories, which usually isn’t allowed with leases. You aren’t limited on mileage and don’t have to worry about wear and tear, except for how it may lessen the trade-in value of the vehicle.

Both leasing and buying lets you drive a fabulous INFINITI home, but they are unique options. You have several factors to consider, such as how much you drive each year, how much you want to spend, and your long-term goals. You can ask questions and find out more about these options at Glendale INFINITI.

Finance with Glendale INFINITI

If buying a vehicle is your goal, you can get approved for financing at Glendale INFINITI with the in-house finance team. We offer auto loans for brand-new INFINITI models, as well as financing for Certified Pre-Owned and used vehicles. It’s an easy process. All you need to do to get started is to fill out the finance application, which you can find online on our website. A phone call will complete the application, which will then be reviewed by a finance representative. They will check your references and credit history. Once approved, they will tell you how much you qualified for, so you can begin looking at vehicles.

The finance representative will sit down with you and show you the various loan options available to you. You can compare rates and monthly terms to decide what fits your budget. You can use your current vehicle for a down payment or add cash to lower your finance amount.

Our finance team will talk to you about other products, such as the extended warranty if you want more coverage after the manufacturer’s warranty expires. We want you to have peace of mind when you buy a vehicle and focus on enjoying it. Once you purchase your INFINITI and have a loan with INFINITI Financial Services, you can keep track of payments, due dates, and your balance online with an account manager. You can set up recurring payments and get a history of your payments all from the comfort of your home. While you can find your own car loan with a local bank or other lending company, working with our in-house finance department allows you to take advantage of loan products and rates that are only accessible with our dealership. We’ll help you save money, so you can afford more care to enjoy.

Service with Glendale INFINITI

Ensure your INFINITI stays in prime running condition with regular service at Glendale INFINITI. Our service technicians will work to keep your vehicle reliable and a smooth ride for as long as you own it. They will take care of all routine service tasks and inspect your vehicle regularly to warn you of future repairs that may be needed. The technicians will give you an estimate of the cost of repairs, how long they will take and when you need to get the work done. We work hard to get you back on the road quickly with as little disruption in your busy life as possible.

The service department at Glendale INFINITI is trained on the latest INFINITI technology and certified to work on INFINITI vehicles. They receive the training necessary for hybrid and electric vehicles to keep up to date with any changes in systems for the newest models.

When the time comes to replace a worn-out part, you can trust our service team. We have advanced diagnostic equipment to ensure we make an accurate diagnosis of the problem. Once we know the issue, we provide a written estimate, so you know the cost and timeframe for getting the work done.

Our technicians use genuine INFINITI OEM parts for long-lasting dependability and optimal performance. Request a courtesy vehicle while your car is being repaired or relax in our comfortable waiting area with complimentary Wi-Fi. As part of our exceptional routine maintenance services, our technicians provide a multi-point inspection for your peace of mind and a car wash at no charge.

Maintenance is an essential part of car ownership, but it can also be expensive. That’s why Glendale INFINITI provides prepaid maintenance plans to help your INFINITI continue to operate at peak performance.

How to Get Your INFINITI Serviced in Beverly Hills

Give us a call at (818) 860-7296 or set up your appointment online for valet pickup and delivery service. You don’t even have to leave your home or office to get your INFINITI serviced at Glendale INFINITI. Our service picks up the vehicle for either maintenance or repair and saves you the time and hassle of driving to our dealership.

What if the INFINITI is Inoperable?

Your INFINITI comes with towing and roadside assistance for four years when you buy either a brand-new model or a CPO vehicle from Glendale INFINITI. We make the arrangements to bring it in for repairs for a stress-free experience in service.

INFINITI Service Description

Regular service is critical to keeping your INFINITI performing at its best. You can rely on the Glendale INFINITI service department to provide the full range of services based on the manufacturer’s recommendations to keep your vehicle in prime condition.

Oil Change Service

Getting the oil changed regularly on your INFINITI is one of the most important things you can do to care for your vehicle. The oil provides a critical service to your engine by lubricating all the working components to reduce wear and tear and lessen friction, which can lead to damage. The oil filter helps keep dirt and grime from the engine, which can also cause damage.

Regular oil changes are critical to your vehicle’s performance. When the oil is ready to be replaced, it stops being as effective. The engine must work harder to do its job because it lacks lubrication. The filter gets clogged up with dirt, which makes it harder for the oil to get through. Regular oil changes based on the manufacturer’s recommendations for your model will help your engine perform more efficiently and last longer. It will also help maintain the market value of your vehicle when you are ready to sell or trade it in.

During a routine oil change, the service technician will take a look at your INFINITI with a multi-point inspection. They look at belts and hoses, tires and brakes, and other components to see if they will need to be replaced soon. This lets you know when repairs are needed before you get stranded. Use INFINITI Express Service if you don’t want to make an appointment. Just stop in, and the service department will get the oil changed, and you back on the road again quickly.

Tire Service

Your tires work hard as you travel mile after mile in your INFINITI. They provide traction when you need it to keep you and your passengers safe. Regular service is necessary to ensure your tires do their job adequately. Tire rotation should be done regularly to ensure they wear evenly and have optimal contact with the road. The service team at Glendale INFINITI will let you know when your tires need to be rotated. It also saves you money because it helps the tires last longer. You won’t be as likely to have a flat tire with a regular tire rotation. The service team will also check the tread and air pressure and let you know if they find a leak or if it’s time to get those tires replaced with a brand-new set.

Air Filter Service

Another component you may not think much about as long as it works correctly is the air filter. The air filter filters the air that gets into your engine to keep out dust and grime. It allows air to circulate through the engine to prevent overheating. When the filter gets clogged with dirt, air can’t get in as easily, which makes the engine work harder and overheat. A dirty air filter can reduce the gas mileage you get and decrease performance. The team at Glendale INFINITI can replace the air filter in just a few minutes.

Battery Service

Since the battery powers your INFINITI, it’s essential to keep it working and replace it when necessary. Otherwise, you could miss an appointment because your vehicle won’t start. The service technicians at Glendale INFINITI can test the battery to tell if it needs to be replaced or if it is still in prime condition. They will also check cables and connections to ensure the current is getting through.

It may be time to replace your battery if you have trouble getting the engine to start or if it gives clicking noises when you try to start the vehicle. The interior lights may dim, or you may have to jump-start your vehicle. Just drop by the service department at Glendale INFINITI and get your battery tested for free. With Express Service, you don’t even need an appointment.

Fluid Flushes

Your vehicle uses several fluids to keep it running. These fluids help lubricate certain moving parts and keep them clean from dirt and road debris. In time, the fluid gets dirty and doesn’t do its job as well. Our service team will drain out the old fluid and replace it with clean fluid. We take care of transmission, power steering, and brake fluid flushes, along with your cooling system. Schedule a fluid flush according to your owner’s manual. If you’re not sure when you should have it flushed, contact Glendale INFINITI and our service team will be happy to guide you based on your model.

Brake Inspection

Your brakes are one of the most crucial components of your vehicle. They are responsible for stopping three or four thousand pounds of metal quickly. Over time, your brakes can wear down and become less effective. The service team at Glendale INFINITI will inspect your brakes and let you know when the brake pads need to be replaced. We’ll look at brake lines, the rotors, and other components of the brake system to ensure your brakes are still working to keep you safe. You’ll want to schedule regular service for your brakes according to your owner’s manual to prevent major problems that can end up causing an accident.

Parts

If you’re the kind of person who likes to work on your own vehicle, you can still rely on Glendale INFINITI for genuine OEM parts. Stop in for an oil filter and air filter when you’re doing routine maintenance. Come to us when you need replacement belts and hoses. Our parts department carries a large inventory of parts for INFINITI vehicles. If you need a specialty part, we’ll order it and have it delivered quickly.

Using INFINITI parts ensures they work with the other components of your vehicle for optimal performance. Accessories and parts are custom designed and come with a 12-month or 12,000-mile warranty when you have them installed at the dealership.

Get a brand-new battery, set of tires, windshield wipers, and more at Glendale INFINITI parts department. Let us help you get the right parts for your model to provide the dependability you expect from an INFINITI.

Beverly Hills Attractions and Things to Do

Beverly Hills lies between Los Angeles and West Hollywood and is one of the most well-known cities in California. One of the best-recognized aspects of the city is Rodeo Drive for shopping. You will also find many celebrities who make Beverly Hills their home. The city has come a long way from its humble beginnings as a Spanish lima bean ranch. It wasn’t until the early 1900s that the city became known as Beverly Hills when the land was subdivided into lots.

Today, Beverly Hills is a wealthy community with talent agencies and entertainment companies making the city their base. Numerous luxury hotels employ hundreds, while the shopping district is another major employment opportunity. You can find plenty of fun things to see and do here, whether you’re a visitor or live in the area.
